name: @boyeborg/carve
description: Download npm packages and their dependencies.
author: Boye Borg

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm publish --access public && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm publish --access public && git push origin master --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm publish --access public && git push origin master --follow-tags
